name: Garden: Urada Chapter
description:
Garden: Urada Chapter is a retro sci-fi RPG for Gameboy made with GB Studio featuring a party of three characters assisting a colony on a recently colonized planet.

The game is split into two parts. The first part features most of the story while the second part has the finale and end game content (secrets, optional bosses...)

Main features

Turn-based battles with challenging bosses

Character progression (levels, equipment, skills)

A world filled with enemies, treasures, and puzzles

Controls in-gamekeyboardfunctionAZinteractBXcancelSTARTENTERopen menuSELECTSHIFTopen additional menuD-padarrow keysmove, navigate menus Install

Open the ROM with an emulator supporting .gb files (tested with VisualBoyAdvance, My Oldboy!)

Or click Run Game at the top of the page to play on the browser.

Project status: beta

Part 1  beta.

Part 2 in development.

Both versions still lack music.

Known issues:

- Some NPCs or objects do not show. Opening and closing the menu should make them appear.
